title: How to Make a Kraft Dinner In The Microwave

steps.title: Pour the Kraft Dinner noodles in your microwave-safe bowl.
steps.content: Pour the Kraft Dinner noodles in your microwave-safe bowl.

steps.title: Fill your measuring cup with 3/4 cups of hot water.
steps.content: Fill your measuring cup with 3/4 cups of hot water.

steps.title: Pour the water into the bowl.
steps.content: Pour the water into the bowl.

steps.title: Put your bowl in the microwave.
steps.content: Put your bowl in the microwave.

steps.title: Microwave for 3 minutes.
steps.content: Microwave for 3 minutes. After it's done, take it out using some form of heat protection. (Oven mitts, etc.)

steps.title: Stir the noodles.
steps.content: Stir the noodles. After it's done, microwave for 3 more minutes.

steps.title: Take it out of the microwave, and add the cheese sauce.
steps.content: Take it out of the microwave, and add the cheese sauce. Using your measuring cup, Add about half a cup of milk, and desired amount of butter.

steps.title: Stir until no noodles are white anymore, and add desired flavourings.
steps.content: Stir until no noodles are white anymore, and add desired flavourings.
